sentences.english: Effects of different preparation procedures on abutment surface roughness.
sentences.chinese: 不同預備程序對基牙表面粗糙度的影響。

sentences.english: The simplified mechanical model is proposed with analysis of forces of abutments in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 通過基牙的受力分析，提出了基牙的簡化力學模型。

sentences.english: The simplified mechanical model is proposed with analysis of forces of abutments in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 通過基牙的受力分析，提出了基牙的簡化力學模型。

sentences.english: Periodontitis was mainly in the abutment teeth and single tooth.
sentences.chinese: 牙齦炎症主要表現在基牙和獨立牙。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the abutment periodontium condition after restored with the distal-extension extracoronal attachment dentures.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價冠外附着體義齒修復後基牙牙周的健康狀況。

sentences.english: In the maxilla, the abutment distribution did not allow a palatal-free restoration.
sentences.chinese: 在上頜，基牙的分佈情況不允許做不覆蓋齶部的設計。

sentences.english: The displacement of abutment correlates to the load on the denture.
sentences.chinese: 基牙的位移量與負荷力大小有關。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the re-repair of broken of original tooth with ceramic crown.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討烤瓷冠基牙折斷後的再修復方法。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the method of prosthesis about the fixed partial denture which the tilted molar used as a abutment.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討以傾斜磨牙作橋基牙的固定義齒修復方法。
